name: Computer Society of India - SRKR Student Chapter
mission: To foster technical excellence among students and bridge the gap between academia and industry through workshops, seminars, and hands-on projects.
vision: To be a premier student chapter that nurtures innovation, promotes collaboration, and prepares students for the challenges of the ever-evolving technology landscape.

history.milestone: SRKR CSI Student Chapter was established
Successfully transitioned to virtual events during pandemic

objectives: Provide industry exposure through guest lectures
Bridge the gap between academic learning and industry requirements
